column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=webanno.custom.Referent|entity|infstat
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=When Beck first filed his WIPO action , I was ready to just give in to make things easier for myself .
#Text=Surrender is always the easiest thing , is n't it ?
#Text=But , I started to think about what the case meant .
#Text=It did occur to me that if Beck succeeded , that his very predictions that he gives on the air -- about international bodies threatening our free speech rights -- would come true .
#Text=I then realized that the case was about much bigger principles .
#Text=Are you happy with your decision to turn over the " www.glennbeckrapedandmurderedayounggirlin1990.com " domain name to Beck ?
#Text=Absolutely yes .
#Text=For one , the meme is already out there .
#Text=In one sense , the job of the meme is over and done with - it has gotten people to talk about the issue , and that was one of the primary goals .
#Text=Another primary goal was to foster that sense of community , and to provide a release valve for the frustration so many have with Glenn Beck , and others like him .
#Text=Of course , we want to keep the entire thing going , but we can do that without the statement version of the domain .
#Text=That domain gets a LOT of traffic .
#Text=I could have taken down the domain , put up a pay per click site , and made a heck of a lot of money by harnessing the advertising revenue from the site .
#Text=It was in my financial best interest to do that - but this was always about free speech - not about profit .
#Text=I absolutely think giving him the domain sends the message that I want to send - this was n't personal , it was political .
#Text=Beck made it about Free Speech principles , and I think I did my part to stand up for those principles .
#Text=But , keeping this particular domain would n't have advanced that cause any further than it had already been advanced .
#Text=I wanted to give him the domain to demonstrate the fact that my interest in fighting the WIPO case was purely a matter of principle .
#Text=Do you have any thoughts or advice for other potential creators of satirical parody websites who may undergo a similar legal process in the future ?
#Text=If you decide to make a political satire site , do it .
#Text=Be prepared to stick it out .

#Text=Get a good lawyer who is committed to First Amendment principles , who knows how to handle this kind of thing , but get one who will teach you and make sure that you are able to make informed decisions .
#Text=There were a lot of lawyers to choose from , but Mr. Randazza seemed to be the best guy for this kind of case .
#Text=His First Amendment credibility is unshakeable , his knowledge of this area of law is fantastic , but he has a reputation for managing his clients ' interests really well .
#Text=He did n't tell me what to do , he taught me what the law was , he gave me options and choices , and let me make informed decisions .
#Text=In a process like this , it is easy to feel like things are out of your control .
#Text=Make sure your lawyer teaches you about what you can control .
#Text=It will make you feel a lot more comfortable .
